headline: Ranbirâ€™s 2026 Mega Strategy!
hook_text: Ranbir Kapoor is playing a high-stakes game with his 2026 releases! Can he rule the box office?
details: Ranbir Kapoor is making a massive power move for 2026. He has reportedly asked Sanjay Leela Bhansali to move 'Love And War' to a June release. This ensures a clear window before his massive epic 'Ramayana' takes over Diwali. With music by Hans Zimmer and A.R. Rahman, 'Ramayana' is being built for a global audience. By spacing these two giants out, Ranbir aims to break every domestic record in a single calendar year. Bollywood insiders say this strategic gap is vital to maximize the hype for both blockbusters. Itâ€™s officially the Year of Ranbir!
subscribe_hook: Which Ranbir film will be bigger: Love And War or Ramayana? Comment below and subscribe to find out more!
